title: Bug 8142: No scoped type hierarchy on binary projects
description: When I hit F4 on a binary project selection (e.g. org.apache.ant), I get a message saying 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant'. I would expect to see the class hierarchies of the internal jars. BTW, what does the message mean?
OB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, the message 'No declaration of selected members in the chosen hierarchy of 'org.apache.ant' is shown.
EB: When hitting F4 on a binary project selection, the expected behavior is to display the class hierarchies of the internal jars for the selected project.
SR:
1. Open a binary project, such as org.apache.ant.
2. Hit F4 on the project selection.
